name: Blibli's Playground of Ego Death
description:
!!! PHOTOSENSITIVITY WARNING !!!

Blibli took some bad drugs. His ego shattered. Not good.

Trapped in a bad-trip-hellscape of his own imagination, he must now find tiny EGO-WIZARDS to help collect his fractured mind and recharge his EGO POWER. Be careful though : MONSTER will come chase you and try to destroy what's left of your psyche !

Use your EGO POWER to chase away MONSTER when he comes for you, making him disappear into this world of illusions... But for how long ?

CONTROLS :

  • WASD + Mouse = Move and look around.
  • E = pickup EGO-WIZARDS to regain EGO POWER and reach the highest score !
  • Space bar = active your EGO POWER to go fast and chase away the MONSTER.

TECHNICAL CHALLENGE :

As time goes on, MONSTER will become more agressive and try to get rid of you.

MONSTER spawns more often, runs faster and becomes harder to kill the more time goes by :O :O :O !!!

CREDITS :

Vincent Blais : Programming

Jean Bulletta : Music

Lucas Farias Tousignant : Art

Frédérik Généreux : Art

Émilie Lavoie : Game & Level Design

Stéphanie Roberge : Art

Francis Tremblay : Programming
